scripts.start: concurrently "rm -rf public/dist && esbuild src/client.tsx  monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/typescript/ts.worker monaco-editor/esm/vs/editor/editor.worker.js monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/json/json.worker monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/css/css.worker monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/html/html.worker --bundle --outdir=public/dist --watch --sourcemap --loader:.ttf=file" "npx partykit dev src/server.ts" "npx serve public" --kill-others
